description:
SkyBridge Luxury & Associates is excited to partner with a prestigious boutique hotel company in Orange County, California, to find a dynamic and experienced Vice President of Human Resources to join their executive team.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Develop and implement HR strategies aligned with the company’s business goals.
  • Oversee recruitment, onboarding, talent development, and succession planning.
  • Foster a positive and inclusive workplace culture.
  • Manage employee relations, conflict resolution, and recognition programs.
  • Design and implement competitive compensation and benefits programs.
  • Ensure compliance with employment laws and regulations.
  • Provide HR metrics and analysis to the executive team.
Qualifications:
  • Proven senior HR leadership experience, preferably in the hospitality industry.
  • Strong knowledge of HR best practices, employment laws, and regulations.
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
  • Strategic thinker with a proactive and innovative approach.
  • Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business Administration, or related field; advanced degree or HR certification preferred.
Benefits:
  • Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
  • Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
  • Professional development and career growth opportunities.
